nodes.text: Skakoverbal, also known as Skakoan, was the language of the Skakoan species from Skako. It was a complex form of machine code closely resembling Bocce with elements of Binary.
Skakoverbal also had a written form, called Skakoform, that used graphemes similar to circuit diagrams and technical schematics.
The Gran bartender Klef could speak it.
